title: Design Challenge
content: Design Challenge Designprov February 2021 Februari 2021 This design challenge is part of the application process for a designer position. You have recieved a mail if you're qualified for this challenge. Detta designprov √§r en del av anst√§llningsprocessen f√∂r en tj√§nst som designer. Du har f√•tt mail om du kvalificerat dig f√∂r provet. Challenge Description Instruktion Learnpoint is organized in courses and each course has a document tool. Users can add, search, and view documents. Learnpoint inneh√•ller kurser och varje kurs har ett dokumentverktyg. Anv√§ndare kan l√§gga till, s√∂ka, och titta p√• dokument. The documents are sorted alphabetically, but there is no other structure. If there are lots of documents, it is difficult for the user to get a clear overview of all the documents. Dokumenten √§r sorterade i bokstavsordning, men i √∂vrigt finns ingen struktur. Om det finns m√•nga dokument √§r det sv√•rt f√∂r anv√§ndare att f√• en god √∂verblick av alla dokument. The problem is not about finding a specific document. If the user knows what document she is looking for, she can use the search feature. The problem is about getting a clear overview if there are lots of documents. Problemet handlar inte om att hitta ett visst dokument. Om anv√§ndaren vet vilket dokument hon letar efter, s√• kan hon anv√§nda s√∂kfunktionen. Problemet handlar om att f√• en god √∂verblick n√§r det finns v√§ldigt m√•nga dokument. The challenge has two tasks: Provet best√•r av tv√• uppgifter: Find and discuss different solutions to the overview problem. Identifiera och diskutera olika l√∂sningar p√• problemet med √∂versikt. Implement one of your solutions. Implementera en av dina l√∂sningar. The Document Tool in Learnpoint Dokumentverktyget i Learnpoint Below is an illustration of the document tool in Learnpoint. Nedan √§r en illustration av dokumentverktyget i Learnpoint. The Document Tool in Learnpoint Dokumentverktyget i Learnpoint How to approach the challange Tips f√∂r att l√∂sa uppgiften This design challenge is primarily about showcasing your work processess and the way you think about design problems. When your work is evaluated, the first task will be more important than the second. Make sure to spend enough time on the first task before moving on to the next. Designprovet skall framf√∂r allt visa hur du arbetar och resonerar kring ett designproblem. Ditt arbete kommer bed√∂mas med tonvikt p√• den f√∂rsta uppgiften. Se till att l√§gga tillr√§ckligt med tid p√• den f√∂rsta uppgiften innan du g√•r vidare till n√§sta. The second task should not result in a complete implementation that's ready for deployment. But it needs to be finished enough to demonstrate your chosen solution. If the solution requires a lot of work, you can limit the implementation to just a part of the solution. To get started, you can use the source code from this example. Den andra uppgiften ska inte resultera i en fullst√§ndig implementation som √§r f√§rdig att leverera. D√§remot beh√∂ver den vara tillr√§ckligt genomarbetad f√∂r att demonstrera din valda l√∂sning. Om l√∂sningen √§r omfattande, kan du begr√§nsa implementationen till en del av l√∂sningen. F√∂r att komma ig√•ng kan du anv√§nda k√§llkoden till detta exempel. Handing in your work Inl√§mning The first task should be documented in a PDF and the second task should be coded in a HTML file. The files should be zipped before you hand them in. Den f√∂rsta uppgiften skall dokumenteras i en PDF och den andra skall kodas i en HTML-fil. Zippa filerna innan du l√§mnar in dom. (Alternatively, you can write a blog post for the first task and/or publish the second task on the web. If you choose this option, you should hand in links instead of zipped files.) (Alternativt kan du skriva ett blogginl√§gg f√∂r den f√∂rsta uppgiften och/eller publicera den andra uppgiften p√• webben. About the Job Om tj√§nsten Design is often split into many different roles such as UI, UX, frontend developement, and so on. At Learnpoint, it's all one role. We believe the best designs come from someone who is involved at every step from idea and research to finished product. Design √§r ofta uppdelat i olika roller som UI, UX, frontend utveckling, och s√• vidare. Hos oss ligger alla dessa i en och samma roll. V√•r √∂vertygelse √§r att riktigt bra design bygger p√• ett djupt engagemang i alla aspekter av designprocessen. This means that designers at Learnpoint are generalists. They are projects managers, visual designers, writers, researchers, developers, and more. Hos oss √§r designers generalister. Dom leder projekt, skriver, skissar, bygger prototyper, implementerar design, och s√• vidare. You'll spend most of your time designing the product Learnpoint. But occasionally you'll be working on other products, tools, and sites that's part of the company. St√∂rsta delen av arbetet √§gnas √•t produkten Learnpoint. Men ibland kommer du jobba med andra produkter, verktyg, och webbsidor som finns inom ramen f√∂r bolagets verksamhet. The day-to-day work varies a lot. During our six week work cycles, we mainly focus on designing and building new features. But as a designer, you'll also be working on bug fixes, adjustments, and minor improvements. Between each development cycle, we spend two weeks doing free research. You can read, design games, take a course, or anything else that will advance your design mastery. Men som designer hos oss kommer du √§ven jobba med buggfixar, justeringar, och sm√• f√∂rb√§ttringar. Mellan varje utvecklingsperiod har vi tv√• veckors fritt arbete. Du kan l√§sa, designa spel, g√• en kurs, eller vad som helst som utvecklar din designkompetens. The team don't share an office, so everyone works remotely. You can work from home, rent an office, or whatever works best for you. Where, when, and how you work is up to you. Vi har inget gemensamt kontor, s√• alla jobbar p√• distans. Du kan jobba hemifr√•n, hyra en kontorsplats, eller hitta p√• n√•got annat. Var, hur, och n√§r du jobbar √§r upp till dig. The job is permanent and full time. Tj√§nsten √§r fast och p√• heltid. Du f√∂rst√•r att det inte finns n√•got f√§rdig recept f√∂r att designa l√§ttillg√§ngliga produkter, men du drivs av att ta reda p√• hur man g√∂r. Du tror p√• att inget intressant b√∂rjar med att veta. Det b√∂rjar med att inte veta ‚Äî det b√∂rjar med en fr√•ga. You are proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. And you love writing.
